name: image-flow
title: Imageflow
description: Image Flow is a powerful optimization tool for images and files, enabling you to process them efficiently with workflows.
author: Godruoyi

commands.name: process-image
commands.title: Process Image
commands.description: Optimize, resize, and compress images in your custom workflow

commands.name: process-file
commands.title: Process File
commands.description: Process your images with custom workflows, such as uploading, renaming, etc

commands.name: process-all
commands.title: Process with Specific Workflow
commands.description: Specify a workflow to process images or files

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
